Commentary: Russell to Wright, no run, short and attacking the top of off, Wright is pushed on the back foot. Defended to cover
Russell to Wright, no run, fractionally short and close to off, Wright can't put bat on the cut
Russell to Wright, no run, another bouncer outside off, Wright sways his upper body out of the way
Russell to Wright, 1 run, Dre Russ keeps it short and outside off, the batsman gets on top of the bounce and square-cuts it away
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, short and down leg, brushes the thigh on its way to Haddin. The caught-behind appeal is nipped in the bud
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, length and outside off, pushed to mid-off for one
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, full and aimed at off, wafted to point off the outside edge
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, short on middle, Shehzad rolls his wrists on a pull and sends it through square leg. Lovely shot
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, shorter and Irfan raps the batsman high on the bat. Played back to Irfan
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length and leaves Shehzad outside off, he pokes and is beaten past the outside edge
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, full and straight, patted to short midwicket

Mohammad Irfan to Wright, FOUR, Wright makes room outside leg, steps out as well, Irfan chases the moving batsman with a short ball. Wright belts it over midwicket. If Wright settles down, this could be a quick chase
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run

Russell to Wright, OUT, loose ball, loose shot, loose dismissal. Short and wide outside off, Wright cuts in the air, and finds Billings at cover point. Tiggsy, this may not be a quick chase. Russell leaps in joy
Wicket: ['LJ Wright c Billings b Russell 5 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 83.33']

Commentary: Russell to Pietersen, OUT, KP out for a first-ball duck! Russell sets off on a long, celebratory run! Blockhole ball, KP is late to bring his bat down. Russell pings middle and leg with an inswinging yorker
Russell to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, lifting ball outside off, Sarfraz rides it to third man and averts the hat-trick
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, short and outside off, another top-quality pull. Controlled hit, Shehzad spins on the back foot and finds the midwicket fence
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to mid-off
Watson to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short and angled in, blocked back
Watson to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, Sarfraz walks down the track as Watson shortens his length. The batsman misses a flick, the ball climbs over the leg stump
Watson to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, chopped from off stump to backward point
Watson to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, full and swings in, tickled to the left of Irfan. He chases gingerly, slides, and looks to roll the ball in. He makes a mess of it
Watson to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, back of a length and just a shade outside off, drop-and-run single to the cover-point region
Watson to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, another drop-and-run single, this time squarer on off. Point was hanging back
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, wide length ball outside off, the batsman reaches out and carves a single to third man
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length, punched crisply to cover
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, full and drifting into the pads, uppish flick, wide of midwicket, beats mid-on to his right

Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, length and angling away, dabbed to point for a quick run. The fielder effects a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Shehzad is lazy. He does not slide his bat in. It's in the air. He may have just managed to get his foot in time
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short and wide outside off, slapped to Ghulam at point
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower shortish ball outside off, punchily played to cover point
Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, short and angling away, Irfan generates extra bounce. The batman uses it to his advantage, cuts it away, beating third man
Mohammad Irfan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short and angled in as Irfan goes round the stumps, chopped behind square on the off side
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length on off, Shehzad bends forward in defence
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, short and outside off, swatted past midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, short again, angled in on off, Shehzad picks the length up early. He dismisses it to the midwicket boundary with a swivel pull
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, Irfan keeps hitting a shorter length, he offers width as well now, cracked away towards third man
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, tossed up on off, Sarfraz welcomes Ajmal with a sweep, beating the fielder at backward square leg. Good, controlled shot
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, flat dart on the pads, turned through backward square leg
Saeed Ajmal to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, lobbed up and full on off, defended back to Ajmal
Saeed Ajmal to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, down the track and clipped to long-on
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, length ball, spins in, worked behind square on the leg side
Saeed Ajmal to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, stump-to-stump line, he uses his feet and twirls it through midwicket
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up and angled in from round the wicket, eased through mid-off

Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, dabbed from off stump to third man. Sarfraz sets off, Shehzad sends him back. Mix-up. Sarfraz threatens to run himself out. He had threatened to run himself and KP out, earlier in the tournament. He turns back and makes his ground
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, poked back to the bowler
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, half-tracker outside off, square-cut away for four
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, nudged to the leg side
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, Shehzad ventures down the track to meet this turning ball. Gently knocked to cover for one
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, short rising ball, deflected to long leg
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, keeps it short, on off, pulled with authority to deep midwicket
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, yorker on off, kept out
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, bouncer, Shehzad ducks under it
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, pitched up on off, hit to mid-off
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, chopped from off stump to third man
Russell to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full ball aimed at off, poked down the ground off an inside edge
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, stylishly done! Fractionally short on off, wristy pull over midwicket on the back foot
Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, effort ball from Dre Russ. Leaps from a back of a length outside off, Shehzad can't ramp it away

Russell to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, Russell comes back and takes down Shehzad. Russell tests Shehzad with a shorter ball. He goes for a hook, Russell raps him high on the bat. Deep square leg runs in and takes a well-judged catch
Russell to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 leg bye, deflected off the pad behind square
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c Sharjeel Khan b Russell 41 (31b 5x4 1x6) SR: 132.25']

Commentary: Russell to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, tucked off the pads to midwicket. Nawaz is underway
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, slides on and spins away outside off, play and a miss
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, flat and round-armish, drifts in on middle, blocked
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, pushed through and turns outside off, beats the outside edge again
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, straight ball, quicker through the air, inside edged onto the pad
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, darted outside off, beats the flashing bat. Ajmal brings the two-man slip cordon into play
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, full and on the pads, swept away towards fine leg
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, punched through backward point on the back foot
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, darted flat and quick, defended to leg on the back foot
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, pushed through just a shade outside off, Sarfraz sweeps a couple through backward square leg
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, slashed to short third man, the fielder throws himself to his left to stop the ball
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, pushed through on the pads, nurdled to midwicket
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, arm-ball, hurries on, angled towards backward point
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, fizzing offbreak, beats the outside edge again
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, off-stump dart, slapped to long-off. Malinga-esque release
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, much slower through the air on off, dabbed to short third man. They pinch a single
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, pushed through point for one
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, Ajmal gives this more air outside off, Sarfraz goes low and sweeps to the square-leg fence
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, punched to long-on
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, fired into the pads, easily put away, wide of mid-on, with a whirl of the wrists
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, fractionally short and outside off, Sarfraz pulls to cow corner on the back foot
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, short again, slides in, forced towards long-on
Imran Khalid to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, chopped to sweeper cover
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, Nawaz skips out, does not meet the pitch, and drags it to midwicket off the inside half
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, extra bounce and turn, stabbed to Watson at midwicket
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, glanced off the pad to short fine leg
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, Ajmal beats the outside edge again. Good turn and bounce
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, pushed through and goes straight on outside off, tapped to point
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, fractionally short and on a fourth-stump line, cut to the off-side sweeper
Saeed Ajmal to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, short and slides in, worked to midwicket
Saeed Ajmal to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, Sarfraz uses his feet, drives to long-on
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, bouncer outside off, controlled pull over midwicket
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, straight slower ball, knocked to fine leg. Sarfraz brings up his fifty off 37 balls
Rumman Raees to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, inducker, inside edged onto the pad, the ball rolls to the off side
Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, free-hit full ball, flayed to cover. A direct hit could have dismissed Sarfraz
Rumman Raees to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, fullish and angled in, patted to the off side
Rumman Raees to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, tapped towards point for one
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, down the track and hoicked to deep midwicket. Quetta win by seven wickets. What a cruise...
